Package view

Class DisplayUserPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.DisplayPageAb
      • view.DisplayUserPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisplayPage
    public class DisplayUserPage
extends DisplayPageAb
    Boundary class between MainDisplayPage and CustomerController. Provides printing and display of options in movie-goer module. Inherits from parent class DisplayPageAb.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lim Wai Leong, Oh Jun Teng, Edhie Wahidin Michelle, Myat Hmu Khin
    See Also:
    controller, MainDisplayPage, DisplayPageAb

    • Method Detail

      • menu

        public void menu()
        Displays the initial menu page shown to user after login. Calls the appropriate methods for each menu option.

      • custLogin

        public static int custLogin()
        Gets unique customer ID if it already exists in database via asking for user email using input. If no record exists in database, creates a new Customer object and adds it to database.
        Returns:
        Unique customer ID
        See Also:
        Customer

      • displayAllMovie

        public static void displayAllMovie()
        Displays all movies.

      • displayTopMovies

        public static void displayTopMovies​(int selection)
        Displays top 5 movies based on either ratings or sales.
        Parameters:
        selection - Choice between top 5 ratings or sales.
        1 for ratings, 2 for sales.

      • displaySearchMovie

        public static void displaySearchMovie()
        Displays movie details of target movie selected by customer via input, as well as list of showtimes available for that movie.
        See Also:
        Movie

      • displayBookingHistory

        public static void displayBookingHistory​(int ID)
        Displays past booking history of customer.
        Parameters:
        ID - Unique customer ID

      • displayAddReview

        public static void displayAddReview​(int custID)
        Displays process for adding a new review to a movie by a customer. Includes error-checking.
        Parameters:
        custID - Unique customer ID

      • getPaymentMode

        public static java.lang.String getPaymentMode​(int payment)
        Checks that payment mode is valid.
        Parameters:
        payment - User-inputted payment mode
        Returns:
        Valid payment mode

      • displayBuyTicket

        public static int displayBuyTicket​(int custID)
        Display for buying of ticket(s) by a customer. Includes error-checking.
        Parameters:
        custID - Unique customer ID
        Returns:
        1 if ticket-buying is successful, -1 if not.
